title: 'Confident that resilient spirit ...': Pakistan expresses solidarity with violence-hit Bangladesh
China urges officials to stop playing ‘throwing eggs’ card game
content: China urged officials to halt playing the popular guandan poker game, arguing it distracted from work responsibilities. Beijing Youth Daily highlighted how the game became a socializing tool among businesspeople and officials, affecting productivity. President Xi Jinping expressed frustration over difficulties in motivating lower-level officials to follow his policies and act decisively in critical situations.
summary: China urged officials to halt playing the popular guandan poker game, arguing it distracted from work responsibilities. Beijing Youth Daily highlighted how the game became a socializing tool among businesspeople and officials, affecting productivity. President Xi Jinping expressed frustration over difficulties in motivating lower-level officials to follow his policies and act decisively in critical situations.

title: From classroom to Capitol: Gwen's impact on Tim Walz's governance
content: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz, a former high school teacher, deeply valued education, which led him and his wife, Gwen, on a lifelong journey in teaching and advocacy. The First Lady's initiatives in prison reform and education reflect their shared values. Their family life includes two children and a keen interest in pet rescues.
summary: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz, a former high school teacher, deeply valued education, which led him and his wife, Gwen, on a lifelong journey in teaching and advocacy. The First Lady's initiatives in prison reform and education reflect their shared values. Their family life includes two children and a keen interest in pet rescues.

title: Nasa forced to delay SpaceX mission: What’s going wrong with Starliner?
content: Nasa delayed SpaceX Crew-9 mission to the ISS due to problems with Boeing's Starliner spacecraft. The Starliner, which transported two astronauts to the ISS in June, has been docked for two months due to propulsion anomalies. Now set for September 24, the Crew-9 mission may return the stranded astronauts and two Crew-8 members as Boeing addresses its issues. Updates are expected on Wednesday.
summary: Nasa delayed SpaceX Crew-9 mission to the ISS due to problems with Boeing's Starliner spacecraft. The Starliner, which transported two astronauts to the ISS in June, has been docked for two months due to propulsion anomalies. Now set for September 24, the Crew-9 mission may return the stranded astronauts and two Crew-8 members as Boeing addresses its issues. Updates are expected on Wednesday.

title: Tropical storm Debby: Community rallies with ice, water, and food distribution post-storm
content: Columbia County residents received crucial relief supplies like ice, water, and food at local community centers following Tropical Storm Debby. Volunteers assisted in distribution, ensuring support for those without electricity. Community members were urged to check on neighbors, especially the elderly. Updates on distribution continued via social media and dedicated hotlines.
summary: Columbia County residents received crucial relief supplies like ice, water, and food at local community centers following Tropical Storm Debby. Volunteers assisted in distribution, ensuring support for those without electricity. Community members were urged to check on neighbors, especially the elderly. Updates on distribution continued via social media and dedicated hotlines.

title: 'I’m a childless cat lady': Harris supporter captures attention at Philadelphia rally as costume goes viral
content: Kamala Harris announced Minnesota Governor Tim Walz as her vice-presidential running mate at a rally in Philadelphia, which included a viral moment with a supporter in a cat costume. Harris emphasized their shared middle-class backgrounds and vision for America. Walz expressed his gratitude and commitment to the campaign on social media, promising readiness from day one.
summary: Kamala Harris announced Minnesota Governor Tim Walz as her vice-presidential running mate at a rally in Philadelphia, which included a viral moment with a supporter in a cat costume. Harris emphasized their shared middle-class backgrounds and vision for America. Walz expressed his gratitude and commitment to the campaign on social media, promising readiness from day one.

title: Why Kamala Harris picked Tim Walz for Vice President
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris selected Minnesota Governor Tim Walz as her 2024 running mate, bypassing the more politically advantageous Josh Shapiro of Pennsylvania. Walz's plain-spoken style and progressive achievements are aimed at reuniting Democratic blocs and countering Republican policies. His selection seeks to boost the party's focus on economic issues and appeal in battleground states.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris selected Minnesota Governor Tim Walz as her 2024 running mate, bypassing the more politically advantageous Josh Shapiro of Pennsylvania. Walz's plain-spoken style and progressive achievements are aimed at reuniting Democratic blocs and countering Republican policies. His selection seeks to boost the party's focus on economic issues and appeal in battleground states.

title: Yahya Sinwar named Hamas leader: What does his appointment mean for Gaza-Israel tensions?
content: Hamas announced Yahya Sinwar as its new political leader on Tuesday, following the assassination of Ismail Haniyeh. Sinwar, accused of masterminding the October 7 attack on Israel, is one of Israel's most wanted militants. The Ezzedine Al-Qassam Brigades subsequently fired rockets towards Israel from the Gaza Strip.
summary: Hamas announced Yahya Sinwar as its new political leader on Tuesday, following the assassination of Ismail Haniyeh. Sinwar, accused of masterminding the October 7 attack on Israel, is one of Israel's most wanted militants. The Ezzedine Al-Qassam Brigades subsequently fired rockets towards Israel from the Gaza Strip.

title: Barack Obama hails Tim Walz as 'exceptional' VP pick: 'Michelle and I couldn't be ...'
content: Former President Barack Obama endorsed Minnesota governor Tim Walz as Vice President, emphasising his inclusive government approach. Obama praised Walz's pandemic recovery efforts, paid family leave, abortion rights protection, and gun safety measures. Obama conveyed his belief in Walz's suitability following Kamala Harris's selection of Walz as her running mate for the US election.
summary: Former President Barack Obama endorsed Minnesota governor Tim Walz as Vice President, emphasising his inclusive government approach. Obama praised Walz's pandemic recovery efforts, paid family leave, abortion rights protection, and gun safety measures. Obama conveyed his belief in Walz's suitability following Kamala Harris's selection of Walz as her running mate for the US election.

title: Why did Royals blast Harry and Meghan citing ‘utter contempt’ towards the King?
content: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle planned a visit to Colombia after an invitation from Vice President Francia Márquez. Courtiers argued this visit strained their relationship with the royal family, accusing them of depicting themselves as British royals. The trip raised questions due to Colombia's high murder rate and Harry's ongoing security concerns in the UK.
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle planned a visit to Colombia after an invitation from Vice President Francia Márquez. Courtiers argued this visit strained their relationship with the royal family, accusing them of depicting themselves as British royals. The trip raised questions due to Colombia's high murder rate and Harry's ongoing security concerns in the UK.

title: Black man dies in Milwaukee hotel incident: 4 employees charged in case resonates with George Floyd's tragedy
content: Four Milwaukee hotel employees were charged with felony murder following D’Vontaye Mitchell’s death after they forcibly restrained him for eight to nine minutes. Mitchell, who struggled to breathe, ultimately succumbed to restraint asphyxia. The autopsy revealed drug use and morbid obesity as contributing factors. Arrest warrants have been issued for the employees involved.
summary: Four Milwaukee hotel employees were charged with felony murder following D’Vontaye Mitchell’s death after they forcibly restrained him for eight to nine minutes. Mitchell, who struggled to breathe, ultimately succumbed to restraint asphyxia. The autopsy revealed drug use and morbid obesity as contributing factors. Arrest warrants have been issued for the employees involved.

title: Israel FM calls to 'swiftly eliminate' new Hamas leader and 'arch-terrorist' Yahya Sinwar
content: Israel’s foreign minister Israel Katz on Tuesday called for the swift elimination of Yahya Sinwar, the new Hamas political leader. Sinwar, seen as a key figure behind the October 7 attack on Israel, was appointed after Ismail Haniyeh's death. Katz described Sinwar as an 'arch-terrorist' and emphasized the need to eradicate Hamas entirely. Sinwar's history and influence within Hamas make him a significant target for Israel.
summary: Israel’s foreign minister Israel Katz on Tuesday called for the swift elimination of Yahya Sinwar, the new Hamas political leader. Sinwar, seen as a key figure behind the October 7 attack on Israel, was appointed after Ismail Haniyeh's death. Katz described Sinwar as an 'arch-terrorist' and emphasized the need to eradicate Hamas entirely. Sinwar's history and influence within Hamas make him a significant target for Israel.

title: The day after, celebration & chaos on streets of Bangladesh
content: Following the ouster of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina, Bangladesh witnessed mass protests and violent clashes. Protesters celebrated the dissolution of parliament, while unrest escalated, leading to numerous deaths and escape of prisoners. The military reshuffled commanders, and garment factories prepared to reopen, as life in Dhaka showed signs of returning to normalcy.
summary: Following the ouster of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina, Bangladesh witnessed mass protests and violent clashes. Protesters celebrated the dissolution of parliament, while unrest escalated, leading to numerous deaths and escape of prisoners. The military reshuffled commanders, and garment factories prepared to reopen, as life in Dhaka showed signs of returning to normalcy.

title: Did Netflix donate $7 million to Kamala Harris's campaign?
X sues advertisers over alleged billion-dollar boycott; Elon Musk declares 'Now it is war'
Venezuelan President Maduro attacks social media, claims 'cyber-fascist' coup bid
content: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro criticized social media platforms like WhatsApp, TikTok, and Instagram for spreading footage and information about protests against his reelection. The protests erupted after the election results were declared, leading to fatalities and numerous detentions. Maduro accused the platforms of promoting hatred and division and urged for social media regulation.
summary: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro criticized social media platforms like WhatsApp, TikTok, and Instagram for spreading footage and information about protests against his reelection. The protests erupted after the election results were declared, leading to fatalities and numerous detentions. Maduro accused the platforms of promoting hatred and division and urged for social media regulation.

title: Trump and Musk to hold an exclusive interview ahead of election
content: Former President Donald Trump announced an interview with Elon Musk, scheduled for next Monday night. The interview comes as Musk publicly endorses Trump's re-election bid, amidst political tensions and allegations. Both Trump and Musk have criticized perceived biases against Trump. Meanwhile, Kamala Harris has chosen Tim Walz as her running mate for the upcoming election.
summary: Former President Donald Trump announced an interview with Elon Musk, scheduled for next Monday night. The interview comes as Musk publicly endorses Trump's re-election bid, amidst political tensions and allegations. Both Trump and Musk have criticized perceived biases against Trump. Meanwhile, Kamala Harris has chosen Tim Walz as her running mate for the upcoming election.
